Time to wait before connecting audio (which is applied in several cases).
Time to keep audio active after USB interfaces report that no audio is present. The maximum value, 65535, indicates that audio is always active.
Time to wait after power on, before initiating the first connection. The maximum value, 65535, can be used to never initiate a connection.
